attributes.action: introduce legislation to protect greyhounds from unscrupolous breeders and trainers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i would like the government to introduce strict laws to help protect greyhounds, tens of thousands are shot or put to sleep because they may not be able to run,they are treated barbarically,yet the government and animal charities do little to help the plight of these gentle animals.the government claims it helps animals ie banning hunting,now it is time to help the dogs and to support their welfare

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce legislation to protect greyhounds from unscrupolous breeders and trainers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19343


Prime Minister's Office
